item.title: Afternoon Market Update - April 21, 2025
item.description: The Dow is down more than 1,000 points. All indices are lower by 3%+.

item.title: BREAKING: UBER SUED BY FTC
item.description: The FTC announced a lawsuit against Uber. Shares hit session lows (-4.22%) on the news.

item.title: Dow drops 3000 points as Fed slashes rates
item.description: The Dow lost 2,997 points, or 12.3%. Circuit breakers were triggered twice.

item.title: Stocks Surge as Central Banks Stimulate
item.description: The Dow gained a record 936 points. Central banks attempted to save the economy.

item.title: Stocks Tank as Financials Implode
item.description: The Dow lost 504 points (4.4%) as Lehman Brothers filed for bankruptcy.
